Rulings.Base: 1. If this monster battles an opponent's monster with the same ATK and both monsters are destroyed by battle, you can still add to your hand 1 Genex monster from your deck.\n2. If this is the only monster you control, your opponent cannot declare an attack at all or attack directly.

PSCT.Base:
1 "Genex" Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner WIND monsters
Your opponent cannot select this card as an attack target. If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle, you can add 1 "Genex" monster from your Deck to your hand.
